name: Ledyba
description: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.
abilities.description: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1.  If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
abilities.description: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
